Author: Blauelf#6622
Content:
@hailesuper That first loop as you describe it would be wrong (or maybe I misinterpret your pseudo-code).
Consider the sequence 2-0-1.
You start with 2 votes.
`candidates[0+1].votes <= candidates[0].votes`, so no update for i=0
`candidates[1+1].votes > candidates[1].votes`, so update for i=1, update winner_count to 1.

Instead of comparing a candidate to the next, compare to the maximum votes so far.
